channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Preserving the Dollar: The Role of CBDCs in Securing Economic Stability for Future Generations
item.description: As financial systems evolve, preserving the US dollar's dominance will require skillful policy management and the integration of cutting-edge technologies.

item.title: Malaysian cyberbully who threatened a TikTok user who then committed suicide only had to pay a $21 fine as punishment
item.description: The death of a Malaysian TikTok user has prompted the government to look into criminalizing cyberbullying and increasing accountability among internet service providers.

item.title: Can Equal Weight Solve Our Concentration Crisis? Not So Fast…
item.description: Mega-cap concentration has exploded since 2015. The corollary to an increasingly top-heavy benchmark is that market diversification and breadth have never been more limited. A multifactor methodology can be a restorative balance to US equities when more traditional measures fall short.

item.title: After water pistols in Barcelona and hunger strikes in Spain, cruise ships may avoid European hotspots where ‘passengers will not be well-treated’
item.description: The world's biggest cruise trade body says it may move to protect passengers' safety amid a wave of overtourism protests.

item.title: In Search of the Elusive Neutral Interest Rate
item.description: With Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's semiannual address to the Senate Banking Committee this week fresh in mind, it is an ideal time to consider the drivers of r*.

item.title: The Mirage is disappearing from the Las Vegas strip—but new operators Hard Rock will reinvent it as a massive guitar-shaped hotel
item.description: New operators Hard Rock International plan to add 600 rooms to an existing 3,044 in a bright new guitar-shaped hotel.

item.title: Commodities for the Long Run?
item.description: Asset classes such as commodities have historically had notable diversification benefits for longer-term investors who are concerned with inflation.

item.title: Ex-CIA analyst specializing in North Korea accused of working as South Korean agent in exchange for Bottega Veneta and Louis Vuitton handbags
item.description: Sue Mi Terry, now a senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations, was indicted on charges of operating as a foreign agent for more than a decade.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: Dior and Armani face antitrust probe in Italy over alleged labor exploitation
item.description: The antitrust regulator said that the two brands may have used supplies from laboratories where workers had to work illegally long hours in inadequate health and safety conditions.
